articles.title: Just Eat shares soar 54% after Prosus offers to buy food delivery firm for $4.3 billion - CNBC
articles.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com is poised to be acquired by Dutch technology investor Prosus in a deal worth roughly 4.1 billion euros ($4.3 billion).
articles.content:
European food delivery giant Just Eat Takeaway.com is poised to be acquired by Dutch technology investor Prosus in an all-cash deal worth roughly 4.1 billion euros ($4.3 billion).

articles.title: Amazon Is Shutting Down Kindle Download & Transfer Via USB - Cord Cutters News
